result.name: expenditure-transactions
result.notes:
Within its financial system, HSE holds transactional data in relation to expenditure it has incurred with organisations for the provision of goods and services.   
The information is collated into the annual accounts which are published on an annual basis.
The dataset includes supplier details, value and date of transaction etc. 
At the transactional level, the dataset includes some personal and commercially sensitive company data. 
A monthly-updated list of all financial transactions spending over £25,000 made by the Health and Safety Executive is published on http://data.gov.uk/dataset/financial-transactions-data-dwp-hse
as part of the Government's commitment to transparency in expenditure.

organization.name: health-and-safety-executive
organization.title: Health and Safety Executive
organization.description:
The Health and Safety Executive (HSE) is the national independent watchdog for work-related health, safety and illness. It acts in the public interest to reduce work-related death and serious injury across Great Britain’s workplaces.

HSE is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.hse.gov.uk/

result.title: Expenditure  Transactions

extras.value: Not due to be released Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
